issue.title: [R] backwards/forwards compatibility for compressed metadata
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11241](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11241). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With ARROW-10386 we compress large metadata, we should add backwards/forwards compatibility tests for this.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11241?focusedCommentId=17264453) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Handled in ARROW-10386
